title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set, but in expression builder, old column names are shown when selecting the dataset
OB: When setting an alias for columns in a data set, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the aliases when selecting the dataset.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new data source and a data set. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the data set as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the data set. 4. Access the expression builder and select the data set.
